title: Windowed Mode Problems
body:
Hi,

when i play the Game in Fullscreen i never drop below 150+ FPS.
when i play in Borderless Windowsed Mode i never go above 50 FPS.
That does make the game impossible to play.

I want to play in Windowed Borderless
Does anyone know a solution for that?

PS: I am using Windows 10

replies.body:
Hmm.. usually on Windows 10 it's the other way around with the FPS and Windowed mode, but let's take a crack at this. Most FPS issues on Windows 10 are caused by the Windows Game Bar's *Game DVR* feature drawing over League and limiting your framerate. I recommend disabling this feature using [**this guide**](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) in case this was contributing to your issues.

Let me know if this caused any change.

Hi,

thank you fro replying.
I don't have that App installed on my PC.

Weird, I've never heard of that being the case. I suppose then, that this may be caused by the other more common culprits such as a problematic display driver or an issue with your system's hardware itself. I suggest going through our [**Framerate Troubleshooting Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting), as it covers the most common solutions that aren't Windows 10-specific.

Hit me up if you have any more issues after taking those steps.
